src/lib/components/DAOInfo.jsx.description:
DAOInfo is the component on the top left of the second header
It receives the DAO name, the network(s), the address, the creation date,
and the participation statistics and shows them in a grid view.

id.description: The ID used to identify the component in Dash callbacks.

network.description: The network the DAO is deployed on

creation_date.description: The creation date of the organization

first_activity.description: The date where the first activity was recorded

setProps.description: Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes

src/lib/components/DataPoint.jsx.description: Used from each DataPoint on the right side of the second header

evolution.description: The absolute difference between this month and the last

evolution_rel.description: The relative difference between this month and the last

src/lib/components/ParticipationStat.jsx.description: This class will be used by DAOInfo and PlatformInfo

value.description: The value to highlight, which will be appended to text

key.description: The key used by React for optimization

src/lib/components/PlatformInfo.jsx.description:
PlatformInfo is the component on the top left of the second header
It receives the DAO name, the network(s) and other data and displays it in a grid view.

networks.description: The networks the platform is deployed in

creation_date.description: The creation date of the organization

setProps.description: Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
